data.title: Photoplay
data.meta_description: Photoplay is a boutique production company. We are inspired by the limitless potential of storytelling in all its forms.  We are a collective of both filmmakers and photographers creating content across all mediums - digital, television, live activations & events, publishing, advertising and art. We focus on smart, quality production whilst striving to create an inspiring home for creative talent. We believe in a world that is experimental, creative and fun. No matter the medium, we are interested in great ideas above anything else.
data.text:
Chris Budgeon and the team braved the freezing cold equinox to shoot men in Bonds underwear. Lucky for everyone the rain only started on the last shot of the evening. Photographed over six locations around Melbourne this campaign was a calendar hit!

Photographer: Chris Budgeon

Producer: Penny Oâ€™Brien / Eve von Bibra

Hair & Makeup: Bernadette Fisers

Props Stylist: Sally Addinsall

Wardrobe Stylist: Ella Murphy

Digital Operator: Daniel Mazzarella

Casting: Kate Austin, Assembly Agency

Assistants: Matteo Macri & Sam Costin
